abstract: The flash of recognition elicits a bittersweet half grin among the British. Peter Dench went back home over the course of a decade to show how and why.
snippet: The flash of recognition elicits a bittersweet half grin among the British. Peter Dench went back home over the course of a decade to show how and why.
lead_paragraph: Look carefully at the English and you may catch a glimpse of a unique expression. It's a bittersweet half grin, a quintessential moment when we recognize and admirably accept our most hideous traits. This smile crossed my face when I first saw Peter Dench's photographs.

headline.main: A Decade of Winks and Winces
